name: Cinnabar Spindle
desc: A sword made from materials that do not belong in this world. The power within might even be able to withstand the corruption of a venom that could corrode a mighty dragon.
skill_desc: Elemental Skill DMG is increased by 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% of DEF. The effect will be triggered no more than once every 1.5s and will be cleared 0.1s after the Elemental Skill deals DMG.
